masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "They're ALL here! A grizzly giving orders, a panda monologuing at cameras, a five-limbed thing on the ceiling, something tiny filling water containers, a badger backing up a semi, and a bear on a laptop! Our ENTIRE honey reserve is being stolen!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Face the full bear crew—all six at once
  • Each bear has different tactics—divide and conquer?
  • Stop them before they escape with 10,000 gallons of honey
